summary: This mod makes Whiterun look like a beautiful enchanted forest. It gives Whiterun a completely different look and now Jorvaskr is a worthy home for werewolves!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://mattandcassie.com/nexus/header.png[/img]

[b][size=4]A New Whiterun[/size][/b]


This mod transforms Whiterun into a mystical forest themed city. Pathways are lined in mixtures of flowers and ferns
while the city's skies are filled with tall pine trees.

Jorvaskr is now fit to be the home of Werewolves. Large trees surround the building showing
its power in the city, while ferns grow all the way to the Sky Forge.

Dragon's Reach now has beautiful garden full of flowers that you can walk through on your way up to the Jarl.

Bringing the life of trees and flowers back to the city has also brought butterflies as well.
Make sure to keep an eye out for them during the day and night.

This new beauty of Whiterun also extends beyond its walls.


[img]http://mattandcassie.com/nexus/middle.png[/img]



[b][size=3]- Recommended Mods -[/size][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10556/?]Tyf-Es LOTR Rohirrim Whiterun Retext[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11534/?]Whiterun Outskirts Market byÂ RadioBoX[/url][b][/b]


[b][size=3]- Requirements -[/size][/b]

Lastest Version of Skyrim

That's it!


[b][size=3]- Known Compatibility -
[/size][/b]
Dawn of Whiterun
Breezehome TNF


[b][size=3]- Installation -[/size][/b]

Installation should be used with Nexus Mod Manager


[b]~ If you enjoyed this mod, please feel free to endorse it, it's free! Thanks! ~[/b]

[img]http://mattandcassie.com/nexus/footer.png[/img][/center]
author: TOSOVNGARDE
